entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers this evening. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:52 PM EDT Tuesday 9 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon with risk of a thunderstorm. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. High 22. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:52 PM EDT Tuesday 9 May 2023
